snippet: The Southwestern Athletic Conference is perennially the lowest-rated league in the country, but Texas Southern’s coach has ambitions to one day earn an at-large tournament bid.
lead_paragraph: The Southwestern Athletic Conference is perennially the lowest-rated league in the country, but Texas Southern’s coach has ambitions to one day earn an at-large tournament bid.

headline.main: Behind Texas Southern, a Lowly Conference Rides High
